decks.notes: This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on deploying threats quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent. The deck includes powerful creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, backed up by removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Chandra, Torch of Defiance provide additional threats and value. The deck also features Heart of Kiran as a versatile threat and ways to fix mana with lands like Inspiring Vantage and Aether Hub. The goal is to apply pressure early and maintain board control to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to put pressure on the opponent quickly with aggressive creatures and powerful removal spells. By using cards like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, along with vehicles like Heart of Kiran, the deck aims to deal damage fast and efficiently. Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provides additional threats and can create tokens to further pressure the opponent. With a balance of creatures, removal, and powerful planeswalkers, this Mardu Aggro deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on utilizing +1/+1 counters and efficient creatures to quickly overpower the opponent. By playing creatures like Walking Ballista, Winding Constrictor, and Rishkar, Peema Renegade, the deck can quickly build up a strong board presence. The addition of removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness helps control the opponent's board while cards like Verdurous Gearhulk provide a strong finisher. With a mix of creatures, removal, and land acceleration, this Golgari Aggro deck aims to take control of the game early and maintain pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive strategies to overwhelm opponents with a combination of powerful creatures and removal spells. By efficiently deploying threats like Toolcraft Exemplar and Heart of Kiran, supported by Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Chandra, Torch of Defiance, the aim is to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain it throughout the game. Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration provide removal options to clear the way for attacks, while cards like Thraben Inspector and Scrapheap Scrounger help with card advantage and resilience. Additionally, the mana base is optimized for consistency and speed.

The deck focuses on using the combo between Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian to create infinite copies of Felidar Guardian. By flickering Felidar Guardian with Saheeli Rai's -2 ability, players can continuously create tokens that can attack and trigger enter-the-battlefield effects. The deck also includes cards like Elder Deep-Fiend to disrupt opponents' plans and Aetherworks Marvel to cheat out powerful creatures. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a board state they can't deal with, leading to victory.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a strong board presence and overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures. Utilizing cards like Sylvan Advocate, Verdurous Gearhulk, and Walking Ballista, the deck aims to establish a fast and aggressive attack while also providing some control with removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness. With a mixture of +1/+1 counters, mana ramp, and efficient creatures, this deck aims to outpace and outmuscle opponents in one-on-one Standard format matches.

The deck focuses on using creatures with +1/+1 counters and utilizing cards that support this mechanic, such as Winding Constrictor and Verdurous Gearhulk. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Sylvan Advocate and Tireless Tracker, while also having removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness to control the board. Additionally, the deck includes planeswalkers like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar for additional value and utility. The mana base is designed to support the Golgari color combination, ensuring smooth gameplay and consistent mana production.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on playing efficient creatures and powerful vehicles to quickly overwhelm opponents with aggressive plays. It utilizes a mix of creature synergy, removal spells, and versatile vehicles like Heart of Kiran to apply constant pressure and close out games quickly. The deck also includes planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar for additional threats and ability to create tokens. The mana base is designed to support a smooth curve of play while maximizing the deck's potential to unleash its aggressive strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly develop a board presence with efficient and powerful creatures, utilizing cards like Winding Constrictor and Verdurous Gearhulk to pump up your creatures and overwhelm your opponent. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner for card advantage and removal spells like Grasp of Darkness and Murder to control the board. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive strategy by providing a good balance between black and green sources.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on explosive early-game aggression with a solid curve of aggressive creatures and removal spells. The deck utilizes powerful vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester alongside efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger to quickly pressure the opponent. Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push provide removal options while Thalia, Heretic Cathar disrupts the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to establish board control early and maintain pressure throughout the game to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a strong board presence and apply pressure on the opponent through aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. By utilizing powerful cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar, Thraben Inspector, and Toolcraft Exemplar, along with vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Aethersphere Harvester, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of a variety of removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push ensures the deck can deal with threats effectively while maintaining its aggressive game plan.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on quickly and efficiently putting pressure on the opponent, utilizing strong creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Veteran Motorist, supported by removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration. The deck features vehicles such as Heart of Kiran to provide additional threats and evasion. The inclusion of Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Thalia, Heretic Cathar helps to protect your board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy while maintaining some resilience and versatility.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar, Veteran Motorist, and Depala, Pilot Exemplar to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. With vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan, the deck aims to maintain board presence and deal damage efficiently. Removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration help clear the way for attacks, while planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar provide additional threats and utility. The deck combines speed, versatility, and resilience to overwhelm opponents in the early game and secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize fast and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. By using a combination of low-cost creatures and powerful artifacts like Heart of Kiran, players can quickly build a board presence and apply pressure to their opponent. Cards like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and Unlicensed Disintegration also provide additional removal and support to maintain tempo and push for a quick victory. The mana base is streamlined to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors and keep the aggression going.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card draw while utilizing Dynavolt Tower as a win condition. By effectively managing resources and disrupting opponents' strategies, the deck aims to outlast and outvalue the opponent before ultimately overwhelming them with a barrage of spells and burn damage from Dynavolt Tower. The deck also utilizes energy generation and efficient creatures to further control the game and maintain card advantage. With a solid mana base and a variety of versatile spells, this deck is capable of adapting to various matchups and outmaneuvering opponents.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through the use of counterspells, removal, and card advantage. The deck aims to generate energy with cards like Attune with Aether and Harnessed Lightning to power up Dynavolt Tower and other energy-based cards. By using cards like Void Shatter and Disallow to counter opponent's spells, along with removal like Shock and Incendiary Flow, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, the deck includes card draw options like Glimmer of Genius to ensure consistency and access to powerful threats like Torrential Gearhulk.
